sense.gloss: cutting a person down (without a second thought), sacrificing, throwing to the wolves, treating as sword fodder
to kill (a human) using a blade (sword, machete, knife, etc.), to slice (off), to lop (off), to cut (off)
quickness (of wit), incisiveness, technical proficiency, skill
to cut off and throw away
to abandon, to disregard, to discard, to throw to the wolves
to discard (numbers after a certain decimal place), to drop, to omit, to ignore, to round down
small samurai sword used for decapitation
cutting, tearing off, cutting off, clipping
cutting (for a railroad, highway, etc.), cut
to fire from a job, to dismiss, to discharge

sdata.j: これはいわゆる↑斬新↑↓ざんしん↓なアイデアです。
sdata.e: This is what we call a "brand new idea".

sdata.j: さて、↑斬首↑↓ざんしゅ↓↑刑↑↓けい↓の↑時間↑↓じかん↓だ。この↑世↑↓よ↓に↑言↑↓い↓い↑残↑↓のこ↓す↑事↑↓こと↓はないか。
sdata.e: Well, it's time for your decapitation. Don't you have any last words to say?

sdata.j: ↑斬新↑↓ざんしん↓な↑意見↑↓いけん↓だね。
この↑建物↑↓たてもの↓、すごく↑斬新↑↓ざんしん↓↑的↑↓てき↓ね。
↑斬新↑↓ざんしん↓な↑意見↑↓いけん↓だね。
sdata.e: That's a novel view, isn't it.
